about_the_game:
Plot Synopsis

After being asked to stay late to close up the restaurant for the night, the employees of the "Masked Munchies" restaurant chain find themselves in a dire situation as they have to survive being attacked by paranormal beings. Uncover more about each entity and the reason why you are being attacked by these ghosts as you try to escape this waking nightmare. You do not have to deal with it alone as you can team up with at least 3 other employees in hopes that you can find safety in numbers.

Gameplay

Grab cleaning items and clean up messes to earn money that you can use at different soda machines that give you passive and active abilities to help you survive. When you complete a level, the remaining money will be added to your player total and you can use that to purchase characters. Choose which level and difficulty you wish to play on and survive the attacks of the ghosts.

Characters

Unlock more characters to choose from and play as them in levels. More characters will be added for free following the game’s release.

Co-op

The game can be played with 1-4 players. You will work together to clean up the restaurant and survive.

The Ghosts

As you clean the restaurant, you will encounter paranormal beings that will get increasingly aggressive as time goes on. You will have to think on your feet and be cautious if you want to make it out alive.

name: I Want To Go Home

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy I Want To Go Home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: These are subject to change throughout development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Better (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: These are subject to change throughout development

short_description: I Want To Go Home is a first-person cleaning simulator game with a horror twist. Clean the restaurant and survive to earn money and unlock characters. Play solo or with up to 3 friends and experience the story that unfolds. All content updates will be free!
